description:
Ishikawa is interviewed by the local newspaper. Ishikawa visits Otori`s house to look at his paintings.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuuketsuki-chan to Shuzai / Kyuuketsuki-chan to Ootori-kun Chi
Li`l Miss Vampire`s Interview / Li`l Miss Vampire Visits Otori-kun
吸血鬼ちゃんと取材 / 吸血鬼ちゃんと大鳥くん家
